name: Date Cake
author: LAUREL1
summary: Simple coffee cake with a wonderful flavor and unique broiled topping.
ingredients: ¾ cup dates, pitted and chopped
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Grease and flour a 9 inch square pan
In a saucepan, combine water and raisins
Bring to a boil and cook for 5 minutes
Remove from heat and stir in chopped dates and baking soda
In a large bowl, cream together 1/2 cup butter and 3/4 cup white sugar until light and fluffy
Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla
Beat in the flour, salt and date mixture
Bake in the preheated oven for 45 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cake comes out clean
Remove cake from oven, and set oven to Broil
Make Topping:  In a saucepan, melt 4 tablespoons of butter
Stir in brown sugar, cream and chopped nuts
Spread mixture over warm cake and place under broiler until lightly browned, about 3 minutes
Watch carefully - it burns easily under the broiler
